top_districts.name: Ixelles
why: Rich in cafes and cultural spots like Flagey Square, perfect for brunch lovers.
Family-friendly parks such as Parc Tenbosch offer space for outdoor activities.
watch_out: Noise levels may rise during weekends due to nightlife in the area.

top_districts.name: European Quarter
why: Proximity to the EU institutions ensures easy access for professionals.
Pleasant cafes along Rue de la Loi provide a vibrant atmosphere for expats.
watch_out: Higher property prices could exceed initial budget expectations.

top_districts.name: Saint-Gilles
why: Diverse community with cafes near Parvis de Saint-Gilles, appealing to expats.
Eco-friendly initiatives and parks promote a family-oriented lifestyle.
watch_out: Busy roads can cause challenges with noise and parking logistics.
